item.title: Telegram Now Features a Bot for Cryptocurrency Prices Monitoring
item.description:
Telegram Now Features a Bot for Cryptocurrency Prices Monitoring

Telegram now features a basic bot that the cryptocommunity might find useful, DCBot (@BlokchainBot). It informs users on prices of diverse cryptocurrencies, and shows news posted in related media. The bot shows the most relevant info on exchange rates of crypto vs. fiat, fiat vs. crypto, and crypto vs. crypto.

item.title: Are blockchain developers fringe developers scattered throughout the world or are there thriving developer communities located anywhere?
item.description:
Are blockchain developers fringe developers scattered throughout the world or are there thriving developer communities located anywhere?

Comfort. Being (somewhat) uncomfortable is so much better for you. Take the job you are not sure you can do. Routine. We crave it. We look for it. We settle into it. It completely dulls our senses. I feel most alive when I can't predict what will happen next. Flings.

item.title: Why PwC's New FinTech Lead Won't Rock the Blockchain Boat - CoinDesk
item.description:
Why PwC's New FinTech Lead Won't Rock the Blockchain Boat - CoinDesk

PwC's new US FinTech director plans to change little about her company's plan of attack on blockchain. The 'Big Four' accounting firm has officially tapped former American Stock Exchange director Geraldine Balaj to head its efforts after her predecessor formally left last month.

item.title: The Fate of Bitcoin - Will it be Bitcoin Core, or Something Else?
item.description:
The Fate of Bitcoin - Will it be Bitcoin Core, or Something Else?

The closed-door meeting between Bitcoin Core developers and miners has affected the prices. With no information about the progress, price continues to fall. Read more... Bitcoin price has been exhibiting a downward trend from the past few days. The fall in Bitcoin price is attributed to uncertainties regarding the outcome of the meeting between Bitcoin Core developer group and miners.

item.title: UniCredit Shares Slide 5% as Italy's Banks Fail Stress Tests
item.description:
UniCredit Shares Slide 5% as Italy's Banks Fail Stress Tests

Italy-based international bank UniCredit saw its shares suspended Monday and 5% losses in overall value as tests showed the country's banks are still unable to weather financial crises.

item.title: Transferwise Blocks Deposits to Bitcoin Processor Cashila
item.description:
Transferwise Blocks Deposits to Bitcoin Processor Cashila

Euro and bitcoin payment processor Cashila has hinted that Transferwise has decided to block deposits to its bank accounts. Transferwise is a traditional money transfer service which gained popularity promising cheaper money transfers. Cashila users often use it to deposit funds into their accounts and to ICONOMI, its ether-based service.

item.title: UnitedPharmacies Now Accepts Bitcoin Payments
item.description:
UnitedPharmacies Now Accepts Bitcoin Payments

Adding use cases for Bitcoin is the best way to grow the ecosystem as a whole. While buying prescription drugs with Bitcoin may not be a top priority for most people, it goes to show cryptocurrency is making waves in the pharmaceutical sector as well.

item.title: Founder of Chinese White Hat Hacker Community Arrested Without Prior Notice
item.description:
Founder of Chinese White Hat Hacker Community Arrested Without Prior Notice

White hat hackers are often looked at a necessary evil, even though these individuals are crucial to any company in the world. Unlike their black hat consorts, a white hat hacker will look for platform or website vulnerabilities to have them fixed before they can be abused.

item.title: Thomson Reuters Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk
item.description:
Thomson Reuters Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk

Mass media company Thomson Reuters has become the latest member of the R3 blockchain consortium. The firm announced today that it had joined the effort, which has seen dozens of banks and finance firms collaborate to explore the technology. Recent members include Absa Bank, one of South Africa's largest banks, and Toyota Financial Services, the financial arm ...

item.title: R3 Blockchain Consortium Adds Thomson Reuters
item.description:
R3 Blockchain Consortium Adds Thomson Reuters

Thomson Reuters, the parent company of prominent international news agency Reuters is the newest member joining the R3 blockchain consortium. The private blockchain consortium led by New York-based R3 will now include mass media company Thomson Reuters.
